feed.title: La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:15 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -24.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maniwaki Airport 03:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -28.4°C
Wind: N 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 early this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 47 in the morning and minus 42 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 35. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
